game.name: Terminal Mass
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Discover "The Domain", an endless expanse of cold concrete, twisted monsters, chaotic anomalies, and powerful artifacts. Harvest resources from this brutalist jungle (inspired by the “BLAME!” manga) to upgrade your weaponry. Will you unveil the horrors that lie at its core, or die trying?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discover "The Domain", an endless expanse of cold concrete, twisted monsters, chaotic anomalies, and powerful artifacts. Harvest resources from this brutalist jungle (inspired by the “BLAME!” manga) to upgrade your weaponry. Will you unveil the horrors that lie at its core, or die trying?
